Reviews.Title: Not worth it!
Reviews.Author: Raymond Cole
Reviews.Content: A horible Camera that takes lower quality picture than a five-year-old with melted crayons.  Also has vertually noting for memory.

Reviews.Title: Cheap camera
Reviews.Author: celisa rambo
Reviews.Content: Not even worth the low price of $10.00.  I thought it would be a good beginner camera for a pre teen. I would have been better off buying from the dollar store. It is cheaply made and only takes 10 pictures, then you need to upload or delete before you can take more :(

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Breathless "Dir En Grey Lover"
Reviews.Content: I rate this camera a 1 star and would rate it a zero star if I could. The display is too hard to read, even with brand new, top of the line batteries, picture taking is too difficult and I cannot take pictures I do manage to take off the camera and onto my laptop, even with help of the C.D that comes with it. Seller should stop selling these as product is really that terrible.

Reviews.Title: Not at all worth it...
Reviews.Author: Miss Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I had purchased the camera in order to have a cheap camera to take places I would prefer not to take my more expensive ones, and I was horrendously disappointed at the picture quality. I took a test shot in a well-lit room, and the picture was still dark, grainy and blurry. If you're paying for it, I would recommend just giving it to a kid to play with - it's not worth keeping it, otherwise.

Reviews.Title: I hated them
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: Poor pictures! I returned all 3. They were too cheap for what I needed them for. Very fuzzy and not clear.

ProductInfo.Features:
300K CMOS sensor
Up to 640 x 480 output resolution
3 digit monochrome LCD display
3-in-1 Mode: Digital Camera, PC Camera and Camcorder
Internal Memory: 8MB SDRAM memory
ProductInfo.Name: Cobra 3-in-1 VGA Digital Camera DC345
